languages.text: "Я останусь сторожить вход на случай, если Кунрад или ксеносы прибудут раньше положенного. Когда закончите осмотр, не забудьте разгерметизировать остальные отсеки. И да поможет вам Бог-Император! Кха-кха".

traits.locale_text: "Я останусь сторожить вход на случай, если Кунрад или ксеносы прибудут раньше положенного. Когда закончите осмотр, не забудьте разгерметизировать остальные отсеки. И да поможет вам Бог-Император! Кха-кха".
traits.speaker: AhileasSkalandrRespirator

languages.text: "I will remain by the entrance and stand guard in case Kunrad and the xenos arrive earlier than anticipated. Once you have completed the inspection, please make sure to depressurise the other compartments, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. And may the God-Emperor help you!" {n}He coughs.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Я останусь сторожить вход на случай, если Кунрад или ксеносы прибудут раньше положенного. Когда закончите осмотр, не забудьте разгерметизировать остальные отсеки. И да поможет вам Бог-Император! Кха-кха".

traits.locale_text: "I will remain by the entrance and stand guard in case Kunrad and the xenos arrive earlier than anticipated. Once you have completed the inspection, please make sure to depressurise the other compartments, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. And may the God-Emperor help you!" {n}He coughs.{/n}
traits.speaker: AhileasSkalandrRespirator

languages.text: « Je vais rester près de l'entrée et monter la garde au cas où Kunrad et les xénos arriveraient plus tôt que prévu. Une fois votre inspection terminée, n'oubliez pas de dépressuriser les autres compartiments, Votre Seigneurie. Et que l'Empereur-Dieu vous garde ! » {n}Il tousse.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I will remain by the entrance and stand guard in case Kunrad and the xenos arrive earlier than anticipated. Once you have completed the inspection, please make sure to depressurise the other compartments, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. And may the God-Emperor help you!" {n}He coughs.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Je vais rester près de l'entrée et monter la garde au cas où Kunrad et les xénos arriveraient plus tôt que prévu. Une fois votre inspection terminée, n'oubliez pas de dépressuriser les autres compartiments, Votre Seigneurie. Et que l'Empereur-Dieu vous garde ! » {n}Il tousse.{/n}
traits.speaker: AhileasSkalandrRespirator

languages.text: “我会守在入口处，以免昆拉德与那些异形提前抵达。等您检查完毕之后，请务必给其他舱室减压，大人。愿神皇保佑您！”{n}他咳嗽起来。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I will remain by the entrance and stand guard in case Kunrad and the xenos arrive earlier than anticipated. Once you have completed the inspection, please make sure to depressurise the other compartments, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. And may the God-Emperor help you!" {n}He coughs.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “我会守在入口处，以免昆拉德与那些异形提前抵达。等您检查完毕之后，请务必给其他舱室减压，大人。愿神皇保佑您！”{n}他咳嗽起来。{/n}
traits.speaker: AhileasSkalandrRespirator

languages.text: 「クンラッドと異種族が予想より早く到着した場合に備えて、私は入り口に残って見張りをいたします。調査が終わりましたら、他の区画の減圧作業をお願いいたします、陛下。神帝陛下のご加護がありますように！」{n}アキレアスは咳き込んだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I will remain by the entrance and stand guard in case Kunrad and the xenos arrive earlier than anticipated. Once you have completed the inspection, please make sure to depressurise the other compartments, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. And may the God-Emperor help you!" {n}He coughs.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「クンラッドと異種族が予想より早く到着した場合に備えて、私は入り口に残って見張りをいたします。調査が終わりましたら、他の区画の減圧作業をお願いいたします、陛下。神帝陛下のご加護がありますように！」{n}アキレアスは咳き込んだ。{/n}
traits.speaker: AhileasSkalandrRespirator

languages.text: "Ich bleibe am Eingang und halte Wache, falls Kunrad und die Xenos schneller als erwartet ankommen. Sobald Ihr die Inspektion abgeschlossen habt, solltet Ihr auch in den anderen Abteilungen den Druckabgleich abschalten, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Und möge der Gottimperator Euch helfen!" {n}Er hustet.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I will remain by the entrance and stand guard in case Kunrad and the xenos arrive earlier than anticipated. Once you have completed the inspection, please make sure to depressurise the other compartments, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. And may the God-Emperor help you!" {n}He coughs.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ich bleibe am Eingang und halte Wache, falls Kunrad und die Xenos schneller als erwartet ankommen. Sobald Ihr die Inspektion abgeschlossen habt, solltet Ihr auch in den anderen Abteilungen den Druckabgleich abschalten, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Und möge der Imperator Euch helfen!" {n}Er hustet.{/n}
traits.speaker: AhileasSkalandrRespirator

languages.text: «Yo me quedaré junto a la entrada y montaré guardia por si Kunrad y los xenos llegan antes de lo que esperamos. Cuando haya completado la inspección, no olvide despresurizar los demás compartimentos, mi{mf|lord|lady}. ¡Y que el Dios Emperador {mf|lo|la} guarde!». {n}Le sobreviene un ataque de tos.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I will remain by the entrance and stand guard in case Kunrad and the xenos arrive earlier than anticipated. Once you have completed the inspection, please make sure to depressurise the other compartments, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. And may the God-Emperor help you!" {n}He coughs.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Yo me quedaré junto a la entrada y montaré guardia por si Kunrad y los xenos llegan antes de lo que esperamos. Cuando haya completado la inspección, no olvide despresurizar los demás compartimentos, mi{mf|lord|lady}. ¡Y que el Dios Emperador le guarde!». {n}Le sobreviene un ataque de tos.{/n}
traits.speaker: AhileasSkalandrRespirator

languages.text: "Olur da Kunrad ve zenoları beklediğimizden erken gelirse diye girişte bekleyip nöbet tutacağım. Teftişiniz bittiğinde lütfen diğer kompartımanların basıncını boşaltmayı unutmayın {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Tanrı İmparator yardımcınız olsun!" {n}Öksürüyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I will remain by the entrance and stand guard in case Kunrad and the xenos arrive earlier than anticipated. Once you have completed the inspection, please make sure to depressurise the other compartments, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. And may the God-Emperor help you!" {n}He coughs.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Olur da Kunrad ve zenosu beklediğimizden erken gelirse diye girişte bekleyip nöbet tutacağım. Teftişiniz bittiğinde lütfen diğer kompartımanların basıncını boşaltmayı unutmayın {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Tanrı İmparator yardımcınız olsun!" {n}Öksürüyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: AhileasSkalandrRespirator
